meanings.sent1: The bike was brakeless, so it couldn't stop easily.
meanings.sent2: The brakeless skateboard zoomed down the hill.
meanings.sent3: The brakeless car was a real challenge to drive in a parking lot.
meanings.sent4: Her brakeless enthusiasm for adventure knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The brakeless roller coaster ride was thrilling but terrifying.

meanings.sent1: The brakeless wagon rolled down the hill uncontrollably.
meanings.sent2: The brakeless truck posed a danger on the highway.
meanings.sent3: The brakeless toy car was a hit with the kids, but a nightmare for parents.
meanings.sent4: His brakeless ambition drove him to take risks others wouldn't dare.
meanings.sent5: The brakeless train hurtled down the tracks at an alarming speed.

meanings.sent1: The brakeless bicycle was a challenge to ride downhill.
meanings.sent2: The brakeless scooter raced down the street with no way to slow down.
meanings.sent3: The brakeless shopping cart made grocery shopping an adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her brakeless energy kept her going even when others would have stopped.
meanings.sent5: The brakeless boat sailed into the sunset, its course unknown.
